CustomField.formula: CASE (TEXT(Q01_Estimated_Annual_Contract_Value__c), "Less than £1.5m",IMAGE( '/resource/GreenCircleTick', 'Green'), "£1.5m - £3m", IMAGE( '/resource/AmberCircleWarning', 'Yellow'), "More than £3m", IMAGE( '/resource/RedCircleCross', 'Red'), "Unknown (Framework or similar)", IMAGE( '/resource/RedColour', 'Red'), "")
CustomField.label: System:Q01 RAG
